input.sentences: it was a wonderful st. [male] 's day parade .
even the policemen were wearing their ribbons with pride .
the bagpipes were playing their irish tunes .
the end of the parade brought many drummers playing .
output.sentences: I went to a party celebrating St. Patrick's day.
I saw an American flag in Irish colors to show pride in both countries.
We all stood in a line to honor the Irish national anthem.
We watched the man play the anthem on his bagpipes.
Along with the bagpipes were a row of drummers to add to the ambience.
